name: SQL Cache Table Processor
description: Caches data resulting from an SQL query and keys it for lookup queries afterwards.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: A database url of the form jdbc:subprotocol:subname.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: The database user on whose behalf the connection is being made.

parameters.name: driver
parameters.description: The driver to be used, for example org.h2.Driver.

parameters.name: sql_query
parameters.description: The SQL query to run for which the results will be cached.

parameters.name: key_by
parameters.description: The SQL column name to key by.

parameters.name: data_query
parameters.description: The query to run on the data, can either be starts_with or equals.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of query to run, can either be starts_with or equals.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The actual query to match the key_by field on.
